display_name: Epworth Sleepiness Scale: Chance of dozing while lying down in the afternoon when circumstances permit
description:
Item from the Epworth Sleepiness Scale [Johns MW 1991 (PubMed ID: 1798888)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1798888)

Original question: *What is the chance that you would doze off or fall asleep (or just "feel tired") in each of the following situations? 12.e. Lying down to rest in the afternoon when circumstances permit*

[Search for all ESS variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mesa/variables?search=epworth)
